tidbits.title: Saharan and Sahelian Landscapes
tidbits.description: Niger features vast Saharan and Sahelian landscapes, with the Sahara Desert to the north and the Sahel region to the south.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: The country is home to diverse ethnic groups, each with unique traditions, music, art, and ceremonies that contribute to Niger's culture.

tidbits.title: Challenges and Development
tidbits.description: Niger faces challenges like food insecurity and desertification but strives for economic development and social progress.
